content:
Help Employees Do More on the Employee Experience Cloud Site

Employees can complete assessments, file complaints about policy violations, and take corrective actions. They can also apply for benefits and assistance. Supervisors can administer performance assessments, create personalized care plans, assign training programs, and track employee progress through goals.

Where: This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions with Public Sector Solutions enabled.

Who: Employees and supervisors need the Employee Experience For Public Sector permission set license.
title: Employee Experience Cloud Enhancements
